# Changelog

## 1.4.0 (2025-11-06)
* Update angular component exports to include 'Component' suffix ([MGNLCLI-385](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-385))
* Replace dialogId with templateId in addAvailability call ([MGNLCLI-425](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-425))
* Prompt for prototype when no default is set and donâ€™t save unless explicitly chosen ([MGNLCLI-434](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-434))
* Add availability for component area ([MGNLCLI-435](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-435))
* Incorrect directory structure when creating Angular component with subdirectory ([MGNLCLI-445](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-445))
* Call validateHeadlessOptions only when project is headless ([MGNLCLI-458](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-458))
